runs.comm: starts around the wicket onto off stump, driven back to him from off stump
similar played, flicked back to the bowler
step down now but flicked only to square leg
goes down to sweep on off stump, comes off the pad to slip
big stride and a flick past short midwicket to get the chase underway
step back and slapped back to the bowler
length outside off and slapped down wide of third man for two
on the stumps now and picked up with superb timing over long for six, lovely strike that
shorter in length, tucked through midwicket on the back foot
back of a length, angled across the batsman, cut and missed
leg stump half volley, tucked out to the deep square leg fielder along the ground
full but leg side, fine leg is up too so a poor delivery
back of a length around middle and off, taken through square leg
full and straight and Nicol misses swinging to leg, it goes past leg stump by a whisker
too far to leg stump now though
fired into the pads again, it runs towards square leg
drive off a length outside off, comes off an inside edge to short fine leg, they run through for a single, direct hit could have been gone
thigh-high full toss, comes off the pad to short long leg
back in the crease, tucked to mid on, a scurried single
bumper and ducked
back of a length, blocked from just outside off wide of the keeper for a quick single

down the wicket, he adjusts and pulls towards deep square leg, the charge back for two and if someone had been over the stumps there could have been a run out there, as it was it was taken five yards away and by the time it was thrown back Williamson was home
bumper, hooked at and missed
length ball around off stump, played up to mid off
back of a length, pulled to mid on
saying that, he steps to leg and times one over mid off for a one-bounce four
full and played to midwicket
full ball, chipped towards long on, bounce in front of the fielder
move across the stumps but only a flick to short long leg where there's a good diving save
full outside off, mid off is up in the circle so this sails over his head for four, clubbed really
slower ball drifts down the leg side
again clubbed to long off, full from just outside off, gets it off low on the bat but struck well enough
again not middled, on the ground wide of mid off, they take a single
short and pulled, top edge over the keeper for four, maybe some luck might get NZ going
down the track, a bit of a swipe across the line and missed completely
a good yorker, dug out down the ground, only a single
pulled to midwicket, not timed
short and off the glove and body down the leg side, past the keeper not enough to get it away for four but a couple more, got cramped trying to pull
back of a length, tucked towards square leg for a single
reverse sweep on middle stump first ball, gets it to short third man
back cut for four off a bit of a bottom edge, slipped it past the 45 this time
little shorter, dragged to long on, on the pull

back of a length ball, skids on and bowled him trying to cut, always the most dangerous shot against Afridi and once again he gets a wicket with a quicker ball as the batsmans tries to hang back and wait for it, knocks out off stump
full ball, played to midwicket
hangs back trying to cut, what are you doing man! Gets beaten with one that skids through
back of a length, tucked to midwicket

waited for the turn and tucked to short long leg, they go for the single but Williamson is struggling to the non-striker's end and doesn't get there, a sharp piece of work to get the throw in time back up the wicket, the bowler did well to gather and whips the bails off and it was before Williamson's dive
tucked to midwicket from a length
and again
hangs back to cut now but it skips through and beats the attempted late cut, well bowled
off stump full ball, dropped to point and that avoids a wicket maiden
big leg side wide
just outside off, bottom-edged cut to the keeper on the bounce
fuller and flicked down to long on
length ball, goes back and pulls to deep midwicket
nice leggie, grips and turns, hits the back pad and runs to short third man, totally beat him
goes back to cut, again the danger is proved but a bottom edge, this runs under the keeper's pads and will race away for four
floated up, drawn forward to nudge at, play and miss outside off
around the wicket, a rather slugged sweep out to deep midwicket
quicker ball on middle and leg, goes to reverse sweep but doesn't get it, only runs towards point
step down but only a flick via midwicket for a single
stays back and just knocked back to the bowler
down the wicket, fired in and it comes off the pad into the covers
length ball, goes to sweep and misses, struck on the back pad but going down leg
big swing outside off, thin edge to short third man
outside off, slapped down the ground on the full to long off
down the wicket and slapped down to long off
full outside off, driven wide of deep cover
goes to reverse it and it skips past the stroke and past the off stump
didn't read the length, chipped over the bowler's head and it runs slowly to long off so they've time to come back for two
full and played up towards mid on
fired in quicker, mis-read and off the pad into the off side
staying back and played to deep backward square
waited for and played behind square on the off side, quick single
finally! Finally! Reverse sweep for four, well timed this
step back and cut past extra cover, oh, I say, another boundary! It runs away from deep cover the slide is not in time
reverse sweep, only straight to the 45 and only a quick single
played back and cut to deep cover
aha! Vettori's heard me...a step down and lovely chip back over the bowler's head
oh this should have gone, full toss on off stump, only pulled to deep midwicket
back and the cut not timed to extra cover
slides down leg side
back and cut to the cover sweeper
leg stump full toss, only back to the bowler
reverse sweep, only to the 45
swing and a miss from one knee, the keeper whips off the bails but I'm 99% sure Vettori had is foot back
down the wicket, stretches for it from outside off, slapped down to long off, straight enough for two
down the wicket again, can only find long off along the ground again
around the wicket, a step down the pitch and a huge hit from leg stump out of the ground over long on

step to leg and finds extra cover and Vettori's vigil is over, that wasn't very pleasant at all, and an ugly ending really, giving himself room, trying to go off side with a drive over the top but surprise surprise, it's not timed and flies straight to the fielder
tossed up outside off, goes to sweep and misses by a mile
step down the wicket, dropped in shorter, tucked to cover
reverse sweep, bit of a top edge but enough bat to get it over short third man
around the wicket, tries to sweep from outside leg, misses, they take the leg bye to square leg
down the wicket but only slapped back to the bowler

nope, full and straight, dug out but it trickles back onto the stumps. Well bowled, a good yorker that McCullum dug out but it ran off his back foot I think which deflected it only leg stump, hard enough to remove the bail, unfortunate that
leg stump and full flicked into the leg side, Taylor wants two, oh dear Oram is struggling but the throw was poor and he gets back
back of a length, played to backward point, they run through
back of a length, slugged into the leg side, just a couple, didn't get all of it
a huge step to leg and flicks it almost between himself and the off stump for four, in fact he did, flicked it over his own stumps
back of a length outside off, a touch wide of off stump too, Oram goes to cut and gets a top edge over the slip cordon for four to third man
taken from outside off, swung towards midwicket, finds the fielder on the bounce

step to leg and a swing and miss and out goes leg stump. The spinner have been too good for the NZ batsman today, just a straight ball really, zipped through a little quicker off the pitch, Oram was aiming for Colombo on one knee and missed totally, losing his middle and leg stumps
outside off stump, pushed through the covers
full ball around off stump, dug out towards long off, just a single
down the wicket, a lofted straight drive is mishit and Ajmal leaping up to his left couldn't hold on, he got both hands to it
shot. Down on one knee and slog swept into the stands, big hit
great start to the over, length ball around middle and off, slugged over wide long on, picked it up for a flat six, great strike
nervous times for Pakistan, full outside off and with mid off up that is four between him and extra cover, another good connection
much better, gets the yorker right and it's dug out down to long on, well bowled, kept his cool
around the wicket, fired in full again, slapped down to long on

length ball, slower, and finds deep midwicket, relief for Pakistan as Franklin goes to pull and top edges it straight to the fielder on the leg side fence, it was a ball that could have gone out of the ground but Franklin didn't quite pick it
another slower ball, well bowled, chopped to point
full outside off, goes to drive and gets an outside edge to the third man fence
four more! What a shot. Crashed from just outside off past deep cover, great strike this is, where has Taylor been all innings
and again! Leg side this time, taken off a length and slapped behind square on the leg side, races to the fence again

slapped down to long off, they have to come back for two and do but it's a great throw from the boundary and Taylor is run out good work from Akmal to gather the throw and get the bails off, end of game surely now, he was never in the frame, run out by miles
great yorker, they go for the single, chance of a run out at the non-striker's end, he misses and it's well backed up, nearly four overthrows
fired in, missed, huge shout for lbw, not out given, must have been outside the line, they take a leg bye
around the wicket, leg stump, flicked away, oh a good diving save at short long leg, that was travelling
big swing and a miss, goes past leg stump
outside off stump, swung outside off and an big edge to short third man took a step down, Ajmal sent it wider, Southee had to reach for it and got a huge top edge straight to the fielder on the 45
slapped from outside off, good hit that past long off

slow ball, long hop outside leg, fired into the leg side, has this found the stands? Nope only finds deep square leg, it was a good ball to hit but he simply didn't catch it properly, put it straight down the fielder's throat
swept and it gets stuck in the pad, dot ball end of the game
